title: Savoury pork and fennel baklava with roasted tomatoes and feta
description: This filo pie is a wonderful way to use up leftover roast meats and much quicker to make that way. For this recipe you will need a 25-30cm/10-12in square cake tin or other similar shaped ovenproof dish.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz pork shoulder, bone in (or 500g/1lb 2oz leftover roast pork, lamb or chicken)
5 tbsp vegetable, sunflower or olive oil
